abstract.para: SUSE® Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications is optimized in various ways for SAP® applications. This document explains how to configure a Convergent Mediation ControlZone High Availability Cluster solution. It is based on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP4. The concept, however, can also be used with newer service packs of SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications.
